review: It works with the tablet. It will not work with my laptop. This is because it requires at least an i3 processor (which my mini does not have). Also be aware whatever the device is you use, you have to be within 20 feet of the tv. But the feed is good. YouTube, Netflix, The Great Courses....they all stream to the tv without grief.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excelent product. Easy to set up. Its small size is ideal for bring it everywhere.
author: Seba Cairo

review: Sound doesn't work! Video no problem. Tried updating, restarting, volume on tv off, volume on, rebooting wifi modem, just about everything under the sun. Don't waste money and hours on this junk. Great only for the deaf-CC works.
author: Linacster
